name: HeroBanner
description: A hero banner is display large image with text, often placed at top of a web page.

name: Pagination
description: Pagination to indicate a series of related content exists across multiple pages.

name: Scaffolding
description: Scaffolding of styles such as default tags.

name: Chip
description: Chips to represents small block of information. They are commonly used to for contacts or for tags.

name: CloseButton
description: A component used for hide or remove element that parent node or specified.

name: Dropdown
description: Toggle contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and more.

name: Message
description: A component used for displaying contextual feedback message.

name: Parallax
description: Parallax is an effect where the background content or image in this case, is moved at a different speed than the foreground content while scrolling.

name: SimpleCRUD
description: A component used for read, update or delete action to collection-item.

name: Tab
description: Tab component that toggling multiple contents.

name: v-trigger
description: Trigger event via event emitter of vue-model.

name: v-set-value
description: Set value to element such as input, select, etc..

name: ElementUtil
description: The javascript library for using DOM Elements conveniently.

name: InputGroup
description: Extend form controls by adding text, buttons.

name: Search
description: Simple search component that fuzzy search given collection data such like json.

name: Sizing
description: Helper classes for specifying width or height of element.

name: Spacing
description: Helper classes for specifying margin or padding spacing to element.

name: Code
description: Display inline or block fragment of computer code.

name: v-outer
description: Add listener for the event that occurs outer of the element.

name: NavDrawer
description: It's the navigation drawer that using horizontal-collapse.
